name: IBM Cloud Private Medium Setup Installation on OpenStack
description: This template will deploy medium instance of IBM Cloud Private on OpenStack

metadata.displayName: Medium Node Deployment of IBM Cloud Private on OpenStack
metadata.longDescription: This template will deploy a Medium instance of IBM Cloud Private on OpenStack

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description:
Medium Node Virtual Machine (8 VMs)
Virtual Machine 1 : IBM Cloud Private Boot Node
Virtual Machine 2 : IBM Cloud Private Master Nodes
Virtual Machine 3 : IBM Cloud Private Proxy Nodes
Virtual Machine 4/5/6 : IBM Cloud Private Worker Nodes
Virtual Machine 7 : IBM Cloud Private Vulnerability Node
Virtual Machine 8 : IBM Cloud Private NFS Server Node

bullets.title: Default Virtual Machine Settings
bullets.description:
• Boot Node: vCPU 4, Memory (GB) 8, Disk (GB) 150
  • Proxy Node: vCPU 2, Memory (GB) 8, Disk (GB) 100
  • Worker Node: vCPU 4, Memory (GB) 8, Disk (GB) 200
  • Vulnerability Node: vCPU 4, Memory (GB) 8, Disk (GB) 150
  • NFS Server Node: vCPU 4, Memory (GB) 8, Disk (GB) 150

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
  2. IBM Knowledge Center for IBM Cloud Private - https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSBS6K/product_welcome_cloud_private.html
  3. IBM Support Portal - https://www.ibm.com/support/home/
